meta.title: Pulse — Progress & focus
meta.description: A simple way to train your focus and see your progress over time. Timed sessions, music, and clear tracking.

hero.title: Pulse
hero.subtitle: Train your focus. See your progress.
hero.description: Timed sessions, music, and clear tracking. For work, study, training, or being present.

problem.title: The problem
problem.content: Focus isn't lost all at once. It fades when there's no rhythm, continuity, and feedback.

items.title: Intentional sessions
items.description: Customizable timers, breaks, and cycles. Set your rhythm and maintain it.

items.title: Sound accompaniment
items.description: Music and ambient sounds that support your attention without distraction.

items.title: Visible progress
items.description: Clear history of your sessions to see your consistency over time.

difference.title: The difference
difference.content: Pulse doesn't try to squeeze your time. It helps you repeat. And that's where real progress appears.

audience.title: Who it's for
audience.forWho: For those who want to improve their focus calmly and see results over time.
audience.notFor: Not for those seeking to do more things in less time at any cost.

items.question: Do I need Spotify Premium?
items.answer: Pulse can work with music from different sources. Some features may require external services. Check the details on the Google Play listing.

items.question: Does it work for Pomodoro, studying, and training?
items.answer: Pulse offers customizable timers that you can adapt to different methods. You can use it for work, study, exercise, or any activity requiring focus.

items.question: What exactly does the progress measure?
items.answer: Pulse records your completed sessions so you can see your consistency. It doesn't promise to measure productivity or external results, only your practice.

items.question: Does it work offline?
items.answer: It depends on your configuration. Some features may require a connection. For specific details, check the information on Google Play.

items.question: Is it free?
items.answer: Check the Google Play listing for updated information on price and availability.
